title: Inapropriate name
body: Let's say i made an account with a racist name ,and i regret it , if i get reported for offensive name , do i get permanently banned? , or do i get a free namechange coz i really want to keep my account

replies.body: Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) , and our player behavior team will look into this and change your name.  I'm not part of the player behavior team, but I don't see why we'd ban you for being proactive in changing your name unless something is really off.  We'll likely consider severity and history of an account, though, to make sure it's not being taken advantage of.  See you there!
